definitions.explanation_en: A surname of English origin, often used as a family name; historically derived from a place name or occupational designation.
definitions.explanation_cn: 源自英语的姓氏，常作为家族名称使用；历史上可能源于地名或职业称谓。
definitions.example_en: John Rees is a well-known historian specializing in medieval Europe.
definitions.example_cn: 约翰·里斯是一位专攻中世纪欧洲的历史学家。
